caption: Existing challenges in droop mitigation and key contributions of the proposed regulation framework.
System-level diagram of the proposed proactive supply regulation scheme with online learning, including the architecture of the Neural Droop Management Unit (NDMU).
Proposed feedforward control of the DC–DC converter employing dual- switch modulation for rapid droop mitigation.
Droop prediction variation across digital SoCs and the proposed online transfer learning scheme for adaptive model update.
Measured performance of the Neural Droop Management Unit (NDMU) and Online Learning Engine (OLE).
Measured regulator efﬁciency and mitigation performance across benchmarks, with comparison to prior works.
Die micrograph and packaging/bonding conﬁgurations of the fabricated chip.
